titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: RESIDUAL DISEASE SIZE FOR GYNAECOLOGICAL CANCER - Description

div.p: A code to identify the size of the residual disease of the Tumour left after the surgery for Gynaecological cancer during a Gynaecological Cancer Care Spell.
This is documented by the surgeon at the completion of the Patient Procedure and captured by the Multidisciplinary Team Meeting.
